content.text:
[@SoapDog (Macbook)](@qv10rF4IsmxRZb7g5ekJ33EakYBpdrmV/vtP1ij5BS4=.ed25519) 

I agree! The `~/.local/share`, `~/.cache`, and `~/.config` directories are the defaults on Unix, but we can use [Windows equivalents](https://github.com/haskell/directory/blob/ab9d0810ce0172e10ff1ca437ad7f723d6648f0d/System/Directory.hs#L1186-L1203) so we integrate with the operating system rather than throwing everything in a shared `~/.ssb` directory.

Previous thread here: %GYRV3ubdT0awysbiIO5SpVUehiFxhHxg9QHq9r68qf0=.sha256
